name: Virtual Fish Tank
description:
• Use the Escape key to toggle the pause menu to restart, quit, etc.
  • Tap the food button to feed your fish.  They'll only eat if they're at least 10% hungry
  • Tap the Medicine button to try to cure any sickness in the fish (sickness bar at the right)
  • Tap the "Clean" button to clean your fishtank.  You can only do this once per minute, and it does stress the fish, causing them to get sick easier.
  • Don't let your fish go hungry or sick.  They can die of starvation or illness.
